column4: hey guys, I was wondering if someone would sit down with me for a while and go through a list of prblems that I have which are keeping the ubuntu experience from shining for me and seeing if we can solve any of them
yes, but there's a bunch of 'em...
- start with 1 and go from there
- what version of ubuntu are you running? I don't run gui but I'm just trying to get you to post more details on your problem
